data.comment: max_samples: limit total samples to process; limit_to_first_half: only process first 50% of data

api_keys.comment: Replace with your actual OpenAI API key

grounding_dino_config.comment: API mode enabled for Grounding DINO - perfect for servers without GPU

models.comment: Model configurations - using API for object detection

processing.comment: CPU device since we're using API for object detection

sampling.comment: Sampling settings - strategies: quality_first, stratified, diversity, hybrid

output.comment: Output settings - intermediate saves help recover from failures
